title: The Lesbian Path
description: For this new edition of her landmark collection of lesbian lives, Margaret Cruikshank has added an interview with May Sarton and texts by Beth Brant, Elsa Gidlow, Judy Grahn and Jane Rule. Praise for the first "The Lesbian Path to self-affirmation is a journey of adventure, excitement, and passion. These stories provide entertainment, escape, reassurance, and a well-marked trail of shared experiences.
